attributes.action: Count driving lessons and driving test centres as essential during restrictions.
attributes.additional_details:
I want this because it’s a huge stress waiting so long to keep having canceled our driving test exams and this is such a big thing for learner drivers to get their driving licence,many of us need our driving licence to work with it or go to work .
Please consider us and help us !
Thank you !
attributes.background: I want consideration for learner drivers we need a solution and help and continue our lessons and going to the driving test exam , we desperately wait for more than a year to get our driving licence , we need to be heard .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
